Package net.proteusframework.core.mail.support

Utility classes used by the mail classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Loader
    Implementers provide the ability to load data for a MessageTemplate.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MessageTemplate
    Represents a mail message template.
    MessageTemplateParser
    XML SAX handler for message templates.
    MessageTemplateParser.MessageAddress
    MessageAddress
    MessageTemplateParser.MutableMailPart
    MailPart that is mutable.
    MessageTemplateParser.Subject
    Subject.
    MimeTypeUtility
    A mime type utility class.
    SMTPVerify
    Verifies that a mailbox exists for an email address.

Package net.proteusframework.core.mail.support Description

Utility classes used by the mail classes. These classes are not intended to be used outside of the module.
